sense.def:
A symptom of an illness
je telesna motnja, ki opozarja, da smo bolni.

seg.quote: The first symptom of a cold is often a sore throat.

sense.def:
A symptom of a bad situation
je tisto, kar se zgodi in kar razumemo kot opozorilo, da je položaj slab.

seg.quote: Migration is a symptom of rural poverty.
